title: Chicken and Broccoli Stir Fry
directions: Whisk together soy sauce, honey, lemon juice, sesame oil, and cornstarch. Set aside. /p Over medium high heat, toast sesame seeds for 2 minutes or until fragrant. Place seeds in a bowl and set aside /p Add olive oil to same skillet, heat over medium high heat. Add chicken, gook until lightly golden brown. Add onions, ginger, broccoli, and pepper. Sauté for 4 minutes. /p Reduce heat to medium low and add soy sauce mixture, stirring to combine. Cook until sauce is desired thickness, but no more than 5 minutes. /p Sprinkle with toasted sesame seeds and serve alone or over rice  /p Serving Size: 1/4 of total yield /p Calories 328 (528 if served with 1 cup cooked rice)
